body_html: @ngimel After copying my container to our servers things broke down again. Our servers use CentOS 7.4 and I'm afraid the new Docker file does not account for that :( I wonder, since you work at NVIDIA, could you please let the team behind CuDNN know about this issue? I could fix things on my side if I knew what environmental variables of the mother OS (CentOS 7.4 in this case) the Docker image depend on.

body: @ngimel After copying my container to our servers things broke down again. Our servers use CentOS 7.4 and I'm afraid the new Docker file does not account for that :( I wonder, since you work at NVIDIA, could you please let the team behind CuDNN know about this issue? I could fix things on my side if I knew what environmental variables of the mother OS (CentOS 7.4 in this case) the Docker image depend on.
